<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[131, 433, 156, 450]]<|/det|>
<label>(i)</label>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[160, 433, 918, 466]]<|/det|>

<label>(ii)</label>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[163, 480, 918, 510]]<|/det|>

\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[118, 596, 322, 612]]<|/det|>
converges to the value \(\alpha\).

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[160, 626, 918, 659]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[107, 829, 918, 864]]<|/det|>
